tier.item: (32) De volgende heette ook Sjef - drugsverslaafd, acht keer achtereen opgenomen
the next one was-called also Sjef - drug-addicted, eight times placed
in een afkickcentrum en twee keer een sociale woning toegewezen gekregen en weer
in a detox-center and twice a social-security house assigned got and again
afgenomen.
taken-away
"The next one was also called Sjef - a drug addict, has been placed eight times in a detox
center, and a social security house has been assigned to him and taken away from him twice."
